ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: Welll, Sorn got his character back (and then switched servers to the Rathe), however our rogue, Tallyn, was unable to get his character back - it was too
ygData.messageBody:
Welll, Sorn got his character back (and then switched servers to the Rathe),
however our rogue, Tallyn, was unable to get his character back - it was too
long... so, there is a time limit I believe of some sort.

Don't look into the light Shada!!!

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 11:35 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
>
>
> Apparently my friend had a very easy time. He called them
> up, told them he
> deleted his character and he was sorry, and Poof ! a couple
> of days later
> he had his character back with No Drop stuff only.
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:garramone@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 11:30 AM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
>
>
> Yes I deleted all no drop items before I deleted the
> character, so when
> I deleted her she had 0 items/pp on her or in the bank. If I did not
> have my epic (everything else is easily replaced) I would not
> play her.
> I don't know if I want to bother trying heh.
>
> Shaisi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 10:09 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
>
>
> ROFLMAO! I thought that was what you meant by "(guess it
> didn't work)".
> Not sure, this guy was gone for over 3 months. Did you
> actually destroy
> all
> your No Drop items before you deleted Shada? If not, then I
> imagine he
> would reappear with everything he had that was No Drop when
> you deleted
> him.
>
> Sorry if I opened a can of worms for ya man.
>
> Kitasi
>
>
